sponsor_weapons.name: Waffle House Spatula
sponsor_weapons.effect: Heals 1 HP when you critically hit
sponsor_weapons.description: A surprisingly effective weapon endorsed by the galaxy's favorite breakfast chain

sponsor_weapons.name: Nike Air Jordans of Jumping
sponsor_weapons.effect: +10 feet to jump distance, advantage on acrobatics
sponsor_weapons.description: Even in the dungeon, you gotta have style

sponsor_weapons.name: Red Bull Energy Drink Launcher
sponsor_weapons.effect: Target gains extra action but crashes next turn
sponsor_weapons.description: Gives you wings... and your enemies a serious caffeine crash

dungeon_weapons.name: Goblin Ear Necklace
dungeon_weapons.description: A grisly trophy that sends a message

dungeon_weapons.name: Crystal Core Blade
dungeon_weapons.effect: 1 in 6 chance to explode on critical hit (2d6 area damage)
dungeon_weapons.description: Forged from dungeon crystal cores, beautiful but dangerous

dungeon_weapons.name: Floor Boss Trophy Weapon
dungeon_weapons.effect: Damage increases with crawler level, intimidates lesser enemies
dungeon_weapons.description: A weapon crafted from the remains of a defeated floor boss

dungeon_armor.name: Crawler's Leather
dungeon_armor.description: Leather armor that bears the scars of dungeon delving

dungeon_armor.name: Sponsor Logo Vest
dungeon_armor.effect: Gain small amount of money when taking damage (viewers donate)
dungeon_armor.description: Nothing says 'professional crawler' like proper sponsor placement

dungeon_armor.name: AI Emergency Shield
dungeon_armor.effect: Activates automatically when HP drops below 25%
dungeon_armor.description: The AI's way of protecting their investment... err, the crawlers

consumables.name: Sponsor Healing Potion
consumables.description: Healing with a side of product placement

consumables.name: Floor Cake
consumables.effect: Celebrate clearing a floor - gain inspiration and +1 to next 3 rolls
consumables.description: Every floor cleared deserves a celebration... even if it's just cake

consumables.name: AI Interference Neutralizer
consumables.effect: Prevents next AI interference or manipulation attempt
consumables.description: Sometimes you need to work around the system

consumables.name: Viewer Energy Drink
consumables.effect: Restore 1d4 HP, small chance of gaining inspiration if viewers are excited
consumables.description: The crowd's energy made manifest in caffeinated form

tech_items.name: Crawler Communication Device
tech_items.effect: Communicate with other crawler teams on same floor
tech_items.description: Standard issue for crawler teams, when the AI allows it to work

tech_items.name: Viewer Drone
tech_items.effect: Small floating camera that provides tactical advantage and boosts viewer count
tech_items.description: Give the viewers a better angle while getting intel

tech_items.name: Dungeon Map Fragment
tech_items.effect: Reveals layout of current floor section, highly sought after by other crawlers
tech_items.description: Knowledge is power, and maps are knowledge

tech_items.name: Emergency Teleporter
tech_items.effect: Single-use emergency escape to safe room, but viewers hate quitters
tech_items.description: Last resort escape, but your reputation might not survive using it

achievement_items.name: First Floor Survivor Badge
achievement_items.effect: Proof of survival, small morale boost to team
achievement_items.description: You survived your first floor. The real dungeon starts now.

achievement_items.name: Crowd Favorite Trophy
achievement_items.effect: Gain advantage on charisma checks, sponsors offer better deals
achievement_items.description: The galaxy loves you, and that opens doors... and wallets

achievement_items.name: Boss Slayer's Ring
achievement_items.effect: +2 damage against boss-type enemies, intimidates lesser foes
achievement_items.description: Forged from the core of a defeated floor boss
